name: CURSED QUEST (itch)
description:
This is an action-platformer we made for Ludum Dare 48 about a tourist who finds himself fighting monsters to reach the bottom of the pyramid.

Music:

"Desert of Lost Souls" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
